	. = 1000
	mov 	#3, R0
	mov 	#-2, R1
	add		R0, R1
	halt

001000 012700: MOV #3 R0 
001004 012701: MOV #177776 R1 
001010 060001: ADD R0 R1 
001012 000000: HALT 

R0 = 000003 R2 = 000000 R4 = 000000 sp = 000000	
R1 = 000001 R3 = 000000 R5 = 000000 pc = 001014
